title: Little memoirs of the eighteenth century,
author: Paston, George
snippet: Cumberland, who was born at Trinity Lodge in 1732, draws an unexpectedly attractive portrait of his famous grandfather, for ' Slashing Bentley with his desperate hook' was longsuffering with children, advocated the answering of their incessant questions, and patiently interpreted their first attempts at reasoning.
